description:

Viribus Unitis is the first dreadnought of Austria-Hungary, the lead ship in a series of four battleships, and a veteran of World War I. Shortly before being destroyed by mines set by Italian combat swimmers, she joined the fleet of the State of Slovenes, Croats, and Serbsâ€”the future Yugoslaviaâ€”becoming the first and last Yugoslavian battleship. The ship received her Latin name after the personal motto of Emperor Franz Joseph I: â€œWith united forces.â€ Despite her relatively small size, she had powerful artillery. In World of Warships, she represents Europe.

Please note: this item is only compatible with game accounts created through Steam.

Viribus Unitis fu la prima dreadnought dell'Austria-Ungheria, la capoclasse di una serie di quattro corazzate, e veterana della Prima Guerra Mondiale. Poco prima di essere distrutta dalle mine piazzate dai sommozzatori italiani, si unÃ¬ alla flotta dello Stato degli Sloveni, Croati e Serbi - la futura Jugoslavia - diventando la prima e ultima corazzata jugoslava. La nave prendeva il suo nome latino dal motto personale dell'Imperatore Francesco Giuseppe I d'Austria: "l'unione fa la forza". Nonostante le sue dimensioni relativamente modeste, era dotata di una potente artiglieria. In World of Warships rappresenta l'Europa.

Nota: questo articolo Ã¨ disponibile solo con gli account di gioco creati tramite Steam.

De Viribus Unitis was de eerste dreadnought van Oostenrijk-Hongarije, het hoofdschip van een serie van vier slagschepen en een veteraan van de Eerste Wereldoorlog. Kort voordat zij werd vernietigd door mijnen gelegd door Italiaanse gevechtszwemmers, voegde de Viribus Unitis zich bij de vloot van de Staat van Slovenen, Kroaten en Serven â€“ het toekomstige JoegoslaviÃ« â€“ waardoor zij het eerste en enige Joegoslavische slagschip werd. Het schip ontving haar Latijnse naam naar het persoonlijke motto van keizer Franz Joseph I: â€œMet verenigde krachten.â€ Ondanks haar relatief kleine omvang had ze krachtige artillerie. In World of Warships representeert ze Europa.

Let op: dit artikel werkt alleen voor spelaccounts die via Steam zijn gecreÃ«erd.

description:

Viribus Unitis is the first dreadnought of Austria-Hungary, the lead ship in a series of four battleships, and a veteran of World War I. Shortly before being destroyed by mines set by Italian combat swimmers, she joined the fleet of the State of Slovenes, Croats, and Serbsâ€”the future Yugoslaviaâ€”becoming the first and last Yugoslavian battleship. The ship received her Latin name after the personal motto of Emperor Franz Joseph I: â€œWith united forces.â€ Despite her relatively small size, she had powerful artillery. In World of Warships, she represents Europe.

Please note: this item is only compatible with game accounts created through Steam.

Viribus Unitis fu la prima dreadnought dell'Austria-Ungheria, la capoclasse di una serie di quattro corazzate, e veterana della Prima Guerra Mondiale. Poco prima di essere distrutta dalle mine piazzate dai sommozzatori italiani, si unÃ¬ alla flotta dello Stato degli Sloveni, Croati e Serbi - la futura Jugoslavia - diventando la prima e ultima corazzata jugoslava. La nave prendeva il suo nome latino dal motto personale dell'Imperatore Francesco Giuseppe I d'Austria: "l'unione fa la forza". Nonostante le sue dimensioni relativamente modeste, era dotata di una potente artiglieria. In World of Warships rappresenta l'Europa.

[h3]Commander![/h3]
Running from November 7 to 18, [b]Battle Pass Special: Vikings[/b] is a unique opportunity to recruit characters of the [b]Vikings TV series[/b] as voiced crew members. With the Improved Pass, you can add the Felice to your trophies: a brand-new [b]Tier IX Premium medium tank[/b] with the [b]â€œWestward Boundâ€ 3D style[/b].

This gift of [b]Personal Reserves[/b] will make conquering the Stages even more fruitful:

[*]Ã—2 +200% to Free and Crew XP for 1 hour[/list]

To claim it, log into the game before 18.11.2024.
Please take note that these Personal Reserves will expire 7 days after you claim them.

Enjoy the new Battle Pass Special: Play bravely as a true Viking, and get all the plunder!
[h3]Roll out![/h3]
